text: pasku iru dina katuwapitiya dewasthanayata maragena marena bomba praharaya ella kala bombakaru radi siti niwase himikaru saha ee awata padinchikaruwan kihipadeneku ada(18) janadhipathi parikshana komisan sabhawa hamuwe sakshi labadunneya. ෙmehidi janadhipathi komisame winisuruwarun wimasa sitiye ema niwase kopamana pirisak padinchi wanneda yanna niwasa kuliyata ganimata pamini thanaththagen wimasa sitiyeda yannayi.

silawimala sangitha adhyakshanaya - sheltan premarathnagitha -aadare wedana kshema gammana gimhanaye - aacharya wiktar rathnayaka – pada – saman chandranath wirasinha aadare wedana kshema gammana gimhanaye - wisharada chandrika siriwardhana – pada - saman chandranath wirasinha aadare wedana - wiktar rathnayaka, chandrika siriwardhana – pada - saman chandranath wirasinha champika ru sirinari – wiktar rathnayaka, chandrika siriwardhanamema githa chithrapataya sandaha athulath nowiya.ranganaya -daglas ranasinha (thushara), sabitha perera (iresha), jo dambaulugala (disanayaka), pushpa kanthi akmimana (soma), garli gunawardhana, chandi rasika, sitha kumari, nalin wijesekara, ranjith lal wirasinha, bandula shri gunawardhana, aananda sirisenadeweni gamanathiragatha wu dinaya - .........idiripath kirima – em. pi. es. chithrapata nishpadanaya – rathnapala marawanagoda adhyakshanaya saha thiranatakaya – ech. di. premarathna katha themawa saha debas - nimal di.
